member.name: Unit
member.summary: The Unit enumeration specifies the unit of measure for a given data type.

member.name: Unit.UnitWorld
member.summary: Specifies world coordinates, a nonphysical unit.

member.name: Unit.UnitDisplay
member.summary: Specifies display units. For example, if the display device is a monitor, then the unit is 1 pixel.

member.name: Unit.UnitPixel
member.summary: Specifies that a unit is 1 pixel.

member.name: Unit.UnitPoint
member.summary: Specifies that a unit is 1 point or 1/72 inch.

member.name: Unit.UnitInch
member.summary: Specifies that a unit is 1 inch.

member.name: Unit.UnitDocument
member.summary: Specifies that a unit is 1/300 inch.

member.name: Unit.UnitMillimeter
member.summary: Specifies that a unit is 1 millimeter.
